extendedInfo.description: Free Ad-Supported VersionDroid Auction eBay allows you to shop, monitor and manage your eBay account.** You cannot list items with this app **This app is in continues development so check back for new feature updates.- Search eBay- Place BIDs and BINs on eBay- View eBay feedback- Leave feedback- View/Add/Remove Watched items- View your eBay Buying/Selling items- Notifications; Outbid, Won, Lost, Bid received, Sold, Unsold- Send/Receive messages to eBay members- Use your saved eBay searches- Bar code scanning- Calendar reminders- Widget ...much more to comeLOCATION permission is used strictly for ad serving purposes.  This app does not directly make use, nor accesses, your location details.  Paid version does not require this permission.Battery issue? Edit notifications frequency under Alerts.Please don't use comments for bug reports, email me droid@matrixvoid.com or click "Send email" below.

reviews.title: Have to update all screens manually!
reviews.comment: Nice concept but needs to update details of auctions automatically to be of any real use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing, Samsung Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: Why do we have to pay for adds free apps. I would of thought we should pay for apps with adds so adds contribute to be seen. Weird. It would be star more but crashing AND useless adds. It doesn\'t update either as previous buyers also found. Widget doesn\'t work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it so far
reviews.comment: Only thing that is missing for me is adding free shipping option in search. If you can add that then I\'ll give ya five stars.
reviews.author: Chris Cornejo

reviews.title: Fab app
reviews.comment: A few bugs.... But I hope they get fixed soon X
reviews.author: vicky kerswell

reviews.title: Won\'t sign in
reviews.comment: Won\'t sign in to account. Says it has to be done on a computer!!! Ridiculous!!!

reviews.comment: What a app!

reviews.title: Not optimized for tablets.
reviews.comment: Not optimized for tablets and all devices with HD displays, text font is extremely small and there\'s no option to enlarge it! Unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good alternative
reviews.comment: It is a great alternative to the eBay official app,however it does not update in real time like the official.  It is soooooooooooooooo annoying to have to manually update messages, my eBay, etc.  Also it does not show all of your messages and the whole inbox feature of the app is poorly formatted.  3 stars for effort.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No saved searches?  Useless.
reviews.comment: Installed this second time, but still returns \"no results\" for saved searches that actually have 100s of hits.  The only function that would be of use, and neither eBay nor this app can offer a working version.  Unistalled, again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Using this until official app gets fixed
reviews.comment: And it\'s working pretty good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, with all the essential features and no fluff
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RUBBISH
reviews.comment: what a truly miserable app this is, what makes it worse is when it works its great but like many other i keep getting the \"no network found\" error, fed up with it, uninstalled. Samsung Galaxy Tab.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No PAID notification for sold items
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I find an app (other than the official eBay app) that will give me notifications for Paid items I sell? Frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Rubbish. doesn\'t list all my bid on auctions,  lists a heap that are now finished and won\'t update. I give up
reviews.author: A Google User
